kjv_def: as large, so great (long, many, much), these many
strongs_def: apparently from G3588 (τοσοῦτος) and G3739 (τοσοῦτος)) and G3778 (τοσοῦτος) (including its variations); so vast as this, i.e. such (in quantity, amount, number of space)
outline:
1. of quantity: so great, so many
  2. of time: so long
